verbs.description: [V: s] a native takes helm of u s province of marianist order father oscar l vasquez ca n’t remember a time when church was n’t a part of his life as a boy the longtime educator and school administrator was setting up chairs for mass at santa cruz chapel on the west side as a teen he was teaching catechism at our lady of guadalupe catholic church and leading the button band at central catholic high school today vasquez is the new provincial or head of the u s province of the society of mary a oscar vasques c marianist u s marianist province united states rev oscar l vasquez holy rosary catholic church st marys ohio oscar vasquez marianists central catholic high school oscar velaquez our lady of guadalupe catholic church rev oscar l vasquez central catholic high school portland oregon central catholic marcelita lozano vasquez holy rosary catholic church san antonio
